contents:
Broadband is a difficult beast to choose
Ducks require broadband, so I set this up as a way to provide an easy method to get broadband at your local pond.
Swans suck.
title: About Æ‘asteriser

contents: Steps to make contact:  Acquire bread Bring bread to pond Rend bread into smaller pieces of bread Scatter bread. Admire my magnificence
title: Contact
